column3: str

The nearby Resistance camp has need of help, and Eshana has a mind to send you.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the Resistance captain east of Virdjala.
Use the Resistance cannon to destroy dharas.
Report to the Resistance captain.
Report to Eshana.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, a requessst for help has come from the Resistance camp to the east. They ssseek to cull unruly dharas.
These creatures feed on rock; if left unchecked, they are liable to cause avalanches, thus endangering travelers.
Pray make hassste to the camp and report to the Resistance captain. He will furnish you with further inssstructions.
Ah, you must be the adventurer they sent! You have our thanks.
As you will have heard, we seek to put down some uncommonly aggressive dharas. And to ensure that they stay down, we will strike their cores with cannon fire.

At the junction to the north, we've laid a hunk of precious ore which attracts dharas. The creatures will single-mindedly march towards it, thus exposing their vulnerable cores to the cannon we've positioned at the perch nearby.
Your task is to use the cannon to destroy the dharas before they can reach the ore. Go now, and good luck!

Use the cannon to destroy the three dharas. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target the core and fire with <If(Equal(PlayerParameter(80),0))><UIForeground>F20222</UIForeground><UIForeground>01</UIForeground><Else/><CommandIcon(15)/> / <CommandIcon(8)/></If>.
Do not let the dharas reach the ore, or the mission will end in failure.
The cannon is positioned at the perch just north of here. Hurry there and use it to destroy the dharas before they can reach the ore!
You did it! The dharas have all crumbled into the rock whence they came!
Our friends of the border guard hold you in high esteem, and small wonder. Thank you, adventurer, and please pass my regards to Eshana.
So the dharas are no more? Excellent work, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. You have done all of us a great ssservice.
That Resistance camp keeps watch over the route to the Peaks. Though our companies be different, we do not hesitate to cooperate with one another for the common good.
My thanks again for your help with the dharas. Please pass my regards to Eshana.
